desc: Glow Botanica's commitment to hormonal well being and balance for women of all ages, across every life cycle, is a forward-thinking and modern approach to health&wellness. I stand behind Glow Botanica's formulations and approach to innovation for continuous management for hormonal wellbeing and aging strategies.

layout.text:
Innovative transdermal solutions and products to
effectively relieve hormonal imbalance symptoms,
from Premenstrual syndrome to Menopause.
